definitions.definition: The state or condition of being a lord .
Title applied to a lord , bishop , judge , or another man with a title.
examples: May I ask that the order be granted, if your lordship so pleases?
definitions.label_groups: by extension , with "his" or "your" , often capitalised

definitions.definition: A boy or man who is behaving in a seigneurial manner or acting like a lord , behaving in a bossy manner or lording it up
Seigniory ; domain ; the territory over which a lord holds jurisdiction ; a manor.

main_definition: The state or condition of being a lord .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , with "his" or "your" , often capitalised ) Title applied to a lord , bishop , judge , or another man with a title.
( humorous , with "his" or "your" ) A boy or man who is behaving in a seigneurial manner or acting like a lord , behaving in a bossy manner or lording it up
Seigniory ; domain ; the territory over which a lord holds jurisdiction ; a manor.
